programme.title: O Drago Invencvel, (2019, Action)

programme.title: Batalha dos Imprios, (2020, Action)

programme.title: Hans Christian Andersen, (1952, Musical)
programme.desc: The opening scene of the movie describes it best: "Once upon a time there lived in Denmark a great storyteller named Hans Christian Andersen. This is not the story of his life, but a fairy tale about the great spinner of fairy tales."

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain, (1967, Thriller)
programme.desc: A billionaire, intent on destroying Communism by starting a world war, is close to achieving his goal with the help of the world's largest, and most powerful, computer. Secret Agent Harry Palmer (Michael Caine) is the only man who can stop him!

programme.title: Topkapi, (1964, Thriller)

programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: A River Runs Through It, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Academy Award-winner Robert Redford (Best Director, Ordinary People, 1980) captures the majesty of the Montana wilderness and the strength of the American family in this acclaimed adaptation of Norman Maclean's classic memoir. Rating: PG

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Hammer (MGM Studios), (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Fred Williamson stars a boxer on-the-rise who is asked to throw a fight by the local mob that has figured prominently in his success. His moral dilemma hits close to home when the life of his girlfriend (Vonetta McGee) is put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merrys been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the actions not dead in the water Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Kriegs pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things arent looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponents weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami whos on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Namis loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one things for sure no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Namis adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmakers younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Namis younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Namis treasure, but whos he working for? More importantly, whos Nami working for, and whats she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats faith in Nami is restored, and now its time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlongs fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Namis former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. Hes so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffys face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town the final resting place of Gold Roger!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!

programme.title: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the islands caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!

programme.title: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captains place. While theyre busy beating each others brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!

programme.title: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!

programme.title: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooters goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!

programme.title: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanjis dreams of the legendary All Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. the Beautiful Chef!

programme.title: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!

programme.title: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!

programme.title: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crews voyage to the Grand Line.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: The Funhouse, (1970, Paranormal)

programme.title: Waves, (2019, Drama)

programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar

programme.desc: Uma teoria sobre aliengenas diz que os extraterrestres Greys vivem em guerra com outras espcies do universo para proteger a Terra.

programme.title: Sem Lei

programme.title: O Golpe

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e Um Beb
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um beb. Mas e se um beb se transforma-se no salvador de suas dvidas?

programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espio Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difcil at hoje: cuidar dos trs filhos de sua namorada, que no gostaram muito do namorado de sua me.

programme.desc: Uma influencer da moda, com dificuldades financeiras, conhece o herdeiro de uma fortuna. A relao com um homem rico do que ela precisa para sustentar seu estilo de vida luxuoso, mas ela entra em conflito quando comea a se apaixonar por ele.

programme.title: Quase casados
programme.desc: Depois de perceber que ela perseguia um relacionamento romntico com o cara errado quando estava no ensino mdio, uma jovem retorna sua pequena cidade para encontrar sua antiga paixo e declarar suas intenes romnticas para ele.

programme.title: Sorte no Amor
programme.desc: Ashley, uma mulher sortuda, troca sua sorte pela do Jake, que est na pior.

programme.desc: Durante suas frias de vero na Espanha, duas amigas se apaixonam pelo mesmo pintor, sem saber que sua ex-esposa, com quem ela tem um relacionamento tumultuado, est prestes a entrar em cena novamente.

programme.title: Retiro romntico

programme.title: Prova de Fogo

programme.desc: Dcada de 1920. Aps fazer um anncio prometendo um dote generoso, um pai encontra um marido para sua filha. Ser que o casamento arranjado poder se transformar em amor verdadeiro?

programme.title: Escobar: Paraso Perdido
programme.desc: Quando um jovem surfista comea um relacionamento com a sobrinha do traficante Pablo Escobar, ele encontra sua vida em risco aps ser levado para o perigoso mundo dos negcios da famlia de Escobar.

programme.title: O Encontro
programme.desc: Nas ruas de Nova York, vive George. Ele est com a sade fragilizada e no tem pra onde ir. Quando George se refugia no maior abrigo de Manhattan, o Hospital Bellevue, ainda se sente perdido, pois o ambiente hostil e est lotado.

programme.title: Premonies
programme.desc: Linda Hanson uma mulher suburbana que um dia avisada que seu marido, Jim, morreu em um terrvel desastre automobilstico. Porm, ao acordar no dia seguinte, tudo est perfeitamente normal em sua vida e Jim est vivo.

programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que est desaparecido h vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua famlia.

programme.desc: Clay Lomax um assaltante de banco que foi trado e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de priso.

programme.title: Montblanc Noland e Calgara conseguem superar suas diferenas antes de dizerem adeus, mas outras foras conspiram para separ-los para sempre!

programme.title: Aps a batalha pica contra Enel, o sol volta a brilhar sobre a Ilha do Cu e seus cidados reconstroem seu lar.

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E61

programme.title: Disfarado, Sanji mostra aos chefs da Marinha, liderados por Jessica, como que se cozinha uma refeio decente para os soldados famintos.

programme.desc: One Piece - S3E63

programme.title: O bando se encontra nas docas e acaba cercado pela Marinha. Usando Nami como falsa refm, eles conseguem fazer os inimigos os deixarem subir a bordo do Merry novamente.
